input.sentences: [male] had fun on his last day of summer .
they got to spend a lot of time in the pool playing games .
[male] 's baby brother wanted to play to but he was n't ready he did n't have any swimmys on .
time to lay back on the floats and relax a bit .
kick those legs little buddy | his dad told him .
output.sentences: The little boy had fun this summer.
He loved to spend time in the pool.
Before he was ready to play, he had to put on his swimmys.
He liked to take the time to lay in the pool and just relax.
His dad was trying to teach him to swim and told him to kick his legs.
